title: Christian Knudsen
text:
Personal life
I live in Rødovre, Denmark, with my husband Kristian who works in IT. Born and raised in the cheap part northern Zealand, I moved to Nærum just north of Copenhagen as soon as I got tired of commuting to DTU. It took me an inordinate amount of time to graduate - mainly due to my intense involvement in the local student organisation. After graduating, the plans for a ph.d. was thwarted by cutbacks on environmental research and I ended up at DNLB as a subject specialist for chemistry. title: Education
text:
The purpose of this page is not to show of everything and claim that I am extremely well educated.
The purpose is to have a complete list. And that includes some courses that are not necessarily that relevant for anything.

title: Organisational work
text:
I have volunteered in several organisations. Paying back to the society of which I am a part, is important to me.
